Text:
The first copy of this book had seeding problems so it has been reposted. Sorry for any hassle. 

Please seed!

Requests welcome at earReaders email address. Trades also welcome as long as you don't mind the trade being posted as an mp3 audiobook.

Looking for..


Playing for Pizza (Unabridged)
John Grisham

Protect and Defend (Unabridged)
Vince Flynn

No country for Old Men (Unabridged)
By: Cormac McCarthy

Kite Runner
By: Khaled Hosseini

Cobra II: The Inside Story of the Invasion and Occupation of Iraq
By: Michael R. Gordon and Bernard E. Trainor

The Audacity of Hope: Thoughts on Reclaiming the American Dream
By: Barack Obama

Blowback (Second Edition): The Costs and Consequences of American Empire (Unabridged)
By: Chalmers Johnson

The Tin Roof Blowdown: A Dave Robicheaux Novel (Unabridged)
By: James Lee Burke





Kids Books
This is a fantastic book! But cheeezus, is he a bad narrator or what?!?! Sometimes the authors shouldn't read their own books. Really... It's like listening to a weather forecast.. Too bad.

While not a professional reader, I think he brings authenticity to the words.

Now Ray Bradbury reading Fahrenheit 451 on the other hand was like listening to paint dry.
